name: Mitchell Bauer
title: IT Director
positioning: IT Director with 6+ years leading $150k+ annual budgets and ERP systems for ~50 staff across multi-site manufacturing. Specializes in vendor orchestration, zero-trust security, and cost optimization while maintaining 99.9% uptime.
highlights: Govern a $150k+ annual IT budget, optimize renewals, and reduce OpEx through vendor management and contract negotiation.
Direct ERP modernization (Macola → QuickBooks Enterprise + Fishbowl) and warehouse/labeling systems with MSP accountability.
Enforce Zero Trust with Entra ID, Conditional Access, Intune, and automated patching for 100% endpoint compliance.
Administer Veeam → Synology backup/DR with offsite replication and routine restore validation.
Modernize telephony with VoIP (RingCentral / GoToConnect), saving ~$6,000/year and standardizing call flows.

experience.summary: Direct technology strategy, security, and operations for a multi-site manufacturing environment; own Microsoft 365, endpoint management, ERP, and vendor lifecycle.
bullets: Govern a $150k+ annual IT budget; negotiate contracts with ISPs, hardware, and SaaS vendors to reduce OpEx while maintaining 99.9% uptime.
Directed ERP modernization (Macola → QuickBooks Enterprise + Fishbowl) and WMS implementation; manage MSP relationship for cloud-hosted ERP (Attivo).
Designed and enforced Zero Trust using Entra ID, Conditional Access, and Intune; achieved 100% endpoint compliance with automated patching, AV/EDR, and BitLocker.
Administer backup and DR via Veeam to Synology NAS with offsite replication; perform routine restore checks to validate RPO/RTO.
Directed external web agencies on a full-stack website redesign with defined scope, deliverables, and launch timelines.
Transitioned from copper PBX to VoIP (RingCentral / GoToConnect), reducing telephony spend by ~$6,000/year.
Established structured IT service delivery with SLAs, internal knowledge base, Teams governance, and secure VPN provisioning.

experience.summary: Dual role across two businesses (~40 staff): IT ownership, operations support, and estimating.
bullets: Implemented Jive VoIP, reducing ongoing telephony costs by ~$7,000/year and improving remote access reliability.
Established and maintained OpenVPN for secure remote access; standardized user device policies and key rotation protocols.
Automated business metrics and reporting via Google Apps Script dashboards, cutting manual reporting time from hours to minutes.
Authored SOPs and training documentation for core systems, improving onboarding consistency and time-to-productivity.
